source_objects.description: Need to learn marketing? Start with courese that introduce you to market research, marketing fundementals and more.
source_objects.title: Marketing Fundamentals

items.title: Traffic Generation Course: The Best Effective Strategies
items.headline: Learn How To Get Highly Targeted Traffic To Your Website From Multiple Sources With The Most Effective Ways
objectives_summary: How to get massive highly targeted traffic to your site for Free
The most effective free and paid traffic generating methods
The hidden secrets of using YouTube to generate targeted traffic and leads

items.title: Church event promotion marketing strategy for big turnouts
items.headline: Event marketing systems that you can customize for your church
objectives_summary: You'll be able to create effective promotions for your events that get people to come
Get more people to stick after an event so your church grows
Plan your event promotions well in advance reducing the stress of rushing

items.title: Market Research & Consumer Behavior
items.headline: Learn how a consumer thinks and makes a decision to develop a marketing strategy
objectives_summary: Students will see the tools and methods to be able to effectively conduct & / or hire and interpret marketing research
Students will learn the building blocks of consumer behavior and decision-making process and how to implement this knowledge in the formulation of effective marketing strategies and tactic.
This course will help you develop an understanding of the importance of knowing your consumers and how to go about conducting thorough market research

items.title: Get Your Marketing In Order For Higher Profits
items.headline: How to Own a Profitable Business in as little as 3 to 6 months, even if you believe / think You are Not a Marketer!
objectives_summary: Turn Your Financial Results Into Marketing Sense
Boost Your Profits Quickly
Develop an Effective Marketing Plan

items.title: Learn About Spin Selling
items.headline: Towards New Way of Selling!
objectives_summary: About Spin Selling

items.title: Fundamental of SEO,Content Marketing and Marketing Strategy.
items.headline: Business Fundamental of Marketing Management and Digital Marketing accompanied with the Case Study.
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn how businesses create value for customers.
Fundamentals of Marketing Management and the problem solving technique.
Case studies on market giants

items.title: Split (A/B) Testing 101 - Make Your Messaging Convert
items.headline: Understanding the reasons for A/B split testing means your offer will ALWAYS convert- if you've tested it enough.
objectives_summary: Use my shortcuts to test their messaging LESS and sell MORE
Know how to test their branding, messaging, and layouts
Spend WAY less time going from ZERO to SALES.

items.title: Where to Market and Sell Information Products

visible_instructors.title: Montina Young Portis
visible_instructors.name: Montina
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder & CEO of CIA Media Group LLC

items.headline: Learn exactly how to build a brand to market and sell information products online.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have a list of sites to market and sell your products on.
You will have an exact plan for selling and marketing
Learn why beginners' online should sell on multiple platforms

items.title: Facebook Music Marketing for Electronic Music Artists
items.headline: This Simple Step-By-Step System Reveals Everything You Need To Know In Order To Market Your Music Online Like A Pro
objectives_summary: You will learn to promote your (electronic) music
Know how to use Facebook Ads to get exposure and countless likes for your artist page
You will know proven Facebook marketing tips, tricks & strategies you can use right away

items.title: Elevator Pitch Mastery- Answer "What Do You Do" Successfully
items.headline: Learn Step By Step HOW to Create and Master Your Elevator Pitch To Be Remembered, Respected and Liked
objectives_summary: Learn HOW to Say What You Do with Confidence and Ease
Learn WHAT to Say to Motivate People to Buy from You
Easily Create your 6 Elevator Pitch Success Components

items.title: Holistic Marketing in the Digital Age

visible_instructors.job_title: Director of Marketing at Princeton Creative
visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.title: Michael Barry

items.headline: Balancing digital and traditional marketing strategies and tactics for your business
objectives_summary: Understand how marketing helps to grow a business
Why Holistic Marketing is best for today's businesses
Find the right marketing strategies and tactics to grow a business

items.title: Learn how to write a powerful brand strategy

visible_instructors.job_title: Chief Marketing Officer at Fueling Brains
visible_instructors.name: Shahzad
visible_instructors.title: Shahzad Khan

items.headline: Practical approach to writing a meaningful & relatable brand strategy that wins customers' heart & mind.
objectives_summary: In this course, you'd learn the step by step approach to build a powerful brand strategy that will guide your business in both demand generation & sales.
We'd begin the course with learning the basics of brand strategy and then move to building a strong brand narrative that is build on consumer insights.

items.title: The Complete Marketing Course for Translators

visible_instructors.job_title: Freelance translator and award winning translator trainer
visible_instructors.name: Tess
visible_instructors.title: Tess Whitty

items.headline: A step-by-step course to create a marketing strategy for busy freelance translators.
objectives_summary: A step-by-step course to create a marketing strategy for busy freelance translators. The strategy is adjusted to your career situation. Two different tracks: beginner, experienced. Different general target markets: agencies, direct clients, and your personalized marketing plan.
How to create a marketing plan to find and work with ideal clients based on their career situation

items.title: How To Blow Up On TikTok In 2020 : A Comprehensive Guide!

visible_instructors.title: Filtrd Foundations
visible_instructors.name: Filtrd
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Marketing Agency & Social Media Educator

items.headline: Kwame Duah unveils the proven tactics and secret hacks that he used to dominate TikTok and gain over 2Million followers!
objectives_summary: Have the confidence to smoothly navigate through the Tik Tok app and search for content.
Create,setup and populate your very own, completely optimised TikTok Account.
Identify your account’s niche and establish your personal brand’s position within the global TikTok community.

items.title: Marketing Strategy - Principles, Strategy, Practice
items.headline: From fundamental principles to modern strategies
objectives_summary: Core marketing principles
Fundamental marketing strategy & application
Persuasive techniques and how to use them

items.title: Public Speaking and Presentations Marketing: Fill The Room!

visible_instructors.title: Jason Teteak
visible_instructors.name: Jason
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, YouTuber, Keynote & TEDx Speaker, CEO Rule the Room

items.headline: 8 Steps To Draw A BIG Crowd And Even "Sell Out" Your Next Presentation, Speech, Lecture, Or Public Speaking Event
objectives_summary: Create a presentation marketing message that sells...
Create your marketing agenda that your audience will crave...
Create your marketing hook that elicits an positive emotional reaction...
